name: Klods
description:
Guide your dice through a dark dungeon and collect different faces with special abilities in a game that mixes puzzle, rpg and roguelike elements.

(There's no sound by the way, your computer isn't broken!)

Made for the GMTK 2022 Game Jam.

Special thanks to the Game maker Discord for shader help, and to Shaun Spalding for his very helpfull tutorials
